app.name: AI Plus Khmer Chat
settingsModal.title: Settings
homePage.hero.title: Experience the Future of Conversation with {{appName}}
homePage.hero.subtitle: Engage in intelligent, bilingual dialogues, analyze images, generate diagrams, and more with our advanced AI chat assistant.
homePage.hero.authPrompt.suffix: your account to use {{appName}} and access its features.
homePage.features.title: Key Features
homePage.features.bilingual.title: Bilingual Conversations
homePage.features.bilingual.description: Seamlessly chat in both English and Khmer, with accurate understanding and generation (v2).
homePage.features.imageAnalysis.title: Intelligent Image Analysis
homePage.features.imageAnalysis.descript: Upload images (PNG, JPG, GIF, WEBP) and get insightful descriptions or answers related to their content. (Premium)
homePage.features.diagramGeneration.desc: Request various diagrams (flowcharts, UML, etc.) and watch them render instantly using Mermaid.js.
homePage.features.voiceInput.title: Voice-to-Text Input
homePage.features.voiceInput.description: Use your voice to chat in English or Khmer with our integrated speech recognition. (Premium)
homePage.whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose {{appName}}?
homePage.whyChooseUs.userFriendly.title: User-Friendly Interface
homePage.whyChooseUs.userFriendly.descri: Enjoy a clean, intuitive, and responsive chat interface designed for ease of use on any device.
homePage.whyChooseUs.cuttingEdgeAI.title: Cutting-Edge AI
homePage.whyChooseUs.cuttingEdgeAI.descr: Powered by Google's Gemini family of models for state-of-the-art natural language understanding and generation.
homePage.whyChooseUs.securePrivate.title: Secure & Private
homePage.whyChooseUs.securePrivate.descr: Your conversations are important. We prioritize your privacy and data security. (Mock auth in use).
homePage.discover.title: Discover {{appName}}
homePage.discover.subtitle: Unlock a new era of intelligent interaction. Whether for learning, productivity, or creative exploration, {{appName}} is your versatile AI companion.
homePage.poweredByAI.title: Powered by Advanced AI
homePage.poweredByAI.subtitle: {{appName}} utilizes a sophisticated intelligent engine based on Google's Gemini family of models to provide you with insightful and relevant responses.
homePage.howItWorks.title: How {{appName}} Works
homePage.howItWorks.step1.title: Sign Up / Log In
homePage.howItWorks.step1.description: Create an account or log in to access all features and your chat history.
homePage.howItWorks.step2.title: Choose Your Tool
homePage.howItWorks.step2.description: Start a new chat, explore the Code Playground, generate images, or use file conversion utilities.
homePage.howItWorks.step3.title: Interact with AI
homePage.howItWorks.step3.description: Type your prompts, speak in Khmer or English, or upload images for analysis. The AI understands and responds.
homePage.howItWorks.step4.title: Get Smart Results
homePage.howItWorks.step4.description: Receive insightful answers, generated code, diagrams, images, or processed files from the AI.
homePage.featureSpotlight.title: Feature Spotlight
homePage.featureSpotlight.codePlayground: Experiment with code, get AI-powered assistance to generate, analyze, correct, and understand code snippets in various languages. Your interactive coding sandbox.
homePage.featureSpotlight.imageGenerator: Bring your imagination to life! Generate unique images from text prompts using advanced AI models. Perfect for artists, designers, and creative minds. (Premium Feature)
Access utilities like simulated PDF-to-Word, AI-powered image-to-text (Khmer focus), and an AI Khmer text refiner to clean up and improve text from various sources.
homePage.meetTheCreator.title: Meet the Creator
homePage.meetTheCreator.name: Kosal Sensok
homePage.meetTheCreator.bio: The visionary creator behind AI Plus Khmer Chat, Kosal Sensok, is dedicated to bridging language barriers and empowering users with cutting-edge AI technology. Driven by a passion for innovation and a deep understanding of Khmer culture, Kosal crafted this platform to be intuitive, powerful, and accessible to all.
homePage.meetTheCreator.imageAlt: Photo of Kosal Sensok, creator of AI Plus Khmer Chat

pricingPage.header.subtitle: Choose a plan tailored to your needs and elevate your AI experience.
pricingPage.footer.note: All prices are in USD. Subscriptions are mock and for demonstration purposes only.

paymentInstructionsPage.methods.aba.scan: Scan the QR code using your ABA Mobile App.
paymentInstructionsPage.methods.aba.ensu: Ensure the payment details match before confirming in your app.
paymentInstructionsPage.methods.bankTran: Please include your email address ({{email}}) in the transfer reference/description if possible.
paymentInstructionsPage.confirmation.pro: After completing your payment using one of the methods above, please click the button below. Your account will be upgraded once the payment is (mock) verified.
paymentInstructionsPage.confirmation.but: I Have Paid - Confirm My Upgrade
